textos_fuente.text: About - StormKing Brewpub & BBQ Skip to content Menu Beer Gift Cards Events Private Events Catering About Careers Contact Menu Menu Beer Gift Cards Events Private Events Catering About Careers Contact Main Menu ORDER ONLINE Take Out Delivery - DoorDash Delivery - Uber Eats Take Out Door Dash Uber Eats Menu Beer Gift Cards Events Private Events Catering About Careers Contact Menu Menu Beer Gift Cards Events Private Events Catering About Careers Contact Menu Beer Gift Cards Events Private Events Catering About Careers Contact Menu Menu Beer Gift Cards Events Private Events Catering About Careers Contact Take Out Door Dash Uber Eats About Us join us for SPECTACULARLY BREWED BEER, KILLER BARBECUE, & FINE COMPANY StormKing Brewpub and Barbecue is all about a passion for great food, drink and a really great time. Quality ingredients, care and passion are at the heart of everything we make. It’s what makes our beer, barbecue, and cocktails stand out from the rest. Our mission is to create a space for everyone, bringing community together as your friendly neighborhood bar. Come as you are and enjoy Texas BBQ and beer brewed right in our taproom! Interested in Collaborating? The Food Executive chef Jordan Smith As some former StormKing patrons know, Jordan fell in love with barbecue way before he ever went to Texas. Market BBQ on Nicollet Ave in Minneapolis will always have a special place in his heart, but it was after a trip south that he decided he was ready to commit. Just like with NY Style pizza, he wanted to eat it in his home town, so he got to work. Excellent meat from clean sources, super fun giant smoker, and a bit of a rub that allows the natural flavors of the meat to shine, not be diminished. If you love meat, you will love this barbecue. See what's smokin' brewED in-house Check out Our current tap list The Beer InterEsted in collaborating? Contact Us Contact 618 N 5th St, Minneapolis, MN 55401 (612) 315-3562 info@stormkingbrewpub.com Order Take Out Order Doordash Delivery Order Uber Eats Delivery Hours Opening Hours Monday 4:00 pm – 10:00 pm Tuesday 4:00 pm – 10:00 pm Wednesday 4:00 pm – 10:00 pm Thursday 4:00 pm – 10:00 pm Friday 4:00 pm – 11:00 pm Saturday 12:00 pm – 11:00 pm Sunday 12:00 pm – 9:00 pm News Sign up for our newsletter Email Subscribe Facebook Instagram Twitter © StormKing Brewpub  /  Design by Foldup Studio Scroll to Top

DONATE 11th Shamrockin Fest BBQ & Chili Competition - FBA Backyard State Championship Site Fri, Mar 15 | Leesburg Town Square Be a part of one of Central Florida's 2 day premier food competition events. This event is a fund raiser to help local firefighters with major medical treatments such as PTSD and cancer. Registration is closed See other events Time & Location Mar 15, 2024, 5:00 PM – Mar 16, 2024, 6:00 PM Leesburg Town Square, 501 W Meadow St, Leesburg, FL 34748, USA Guests + 17 other guests About the event The 11th Fireifighter Charity BBQ & Chili Competition now known as Shamrockin' BBQ & Beer Festival is a fund raiser hosted by the Firefighter's Charity of Central Florida. This fund raiser helps fund our Florian Fund. This fund provides financial assistance to local firefighters enduring catastrophic crisis such as PTSD and cancer treatments. We are pleased to announce we are a Backyard Cooker competition sanctioned by the Florida BBQ Association AND have been selected as a FBA Backyard State Championship Site for our 2024 competition. For our local teams, we have  a HomeTown cooking division for those teams that may not compete on a  regular basis. We are awarding over $5,000 in prizes and trophies! Choose one or all competitions to increase your chances to win your share of cash prizes, trophies and DOUBLE FBA points: Please note Backyard & Hometown Competitions - People's Choice is REQUIRED. We will provide… Show More Schedule 10:40 AM - 11:00 AM 20 minutes Turn in Chicken Entry FBA Table 11:40 AM - 12:00 PM 20 minutes Turn In Pork Ribs FBA Table 3 more items available See All Share this event SIGN UP EMAIL NOTIFICATIONS THANK YOU TO OUR 2025 SPONSORS THANK YOU TO OUR 2024 SPONSORS POST 35 - Mt Dora POST 8087 Presented by info@firefightercharityCF.org 2880 David Walker Dr. Ste. 166  Eustis, FL 32726 ©2023 Firefighter Charity of Central Florida  TM - Shamrockin' Fest is a registered trademark google-site-verification: google6da0da3df5e14a55.html bottom of page

Shamrock Festival Tournament Information HOME 2025 SCHEDULE Facility Locations/Seating Friday Night Schedule Dig for Dula Kids' Clinic Officials Hotel Information FAQ Recruiting Showcase College Coaches Sponsors Photos Contact Menu 710 Williamson Road Northeast Roanoke, VA, 24016 March 14-15, 2026 Your Custom Text Here Tournament Information HOME 2025 SCHEDULE Facility Locations/Seating Friday Night Schedule Dig for Dula Kids' Clinic Officials Hotel Information FAQ Recruiting Showcase College Coaches Sponsors Photos Contact SAVE THE DATE The 2026 Shamrock Festival will be the weekend of March 14-15, 2026 .  All age divisions will be individual this year (no combined age groups) and teams can “play-up” one age group if they choose to do so.  At the request of some clubs, we have added an online payment option to pay for team entry fees by credit card this year as well.  Team Registration opens in AES on October 1st.  Registration for the Friday night Shamrock Showcase (8-12 graders) and the Friday Night “Dig for Dula” Kids’ Clinic (5-13 year olds) will open on November 1st.  Check those pages for additional details.

IFG Events brands include: Quad State Beer Fest: ShamRocked and Halloween Hysteria, Quad State Pickle Fest, Quad State Wine Fest, Quad State Flavor Fest, Quad State Brunch Fest, Quad State Cheese Fest and Fall Back Ciders, Spirits & Wine Fest. IFGC consults on the production of these large, safe, fun events in and around Washington County, MD. IFG Events have raised over $300,000 for area nonprofit groups since its inception. None of this would be possible over the years without the support of sponsors, partners, vendors, volunteers, and most importantly, the patrons. © 2014-2025 IFG Consulting LLC bottom of page

Beer, Bourbon & BBQ Festival FAQs - Cary, North Carolina Skip to content Home Menu Schedule Directions Sponsors FAQ Merchandise Become a Vendor! Join our Newsletter Home Menu Schedule Directions Sponsors FAQ Merchandise Become a Vendor! Join our Newsletter FAQ Sarah McNew 2024-10-15T13:39:28-04:00 FAQS Koka Booth Amphitheatre Clear Bag Policy katwhite 2024-03-26T09:26:18-04:00 Koka Booth Amphitheatre Clear Bag Policy Koka Booth Amphitheatre has enhanced its public safety policies regarding bags and purses allowed in the venue, including clear bags. Clear bags are easily searched and significantly reduce faculty bag searches. They also support the Department of Homeland Security’s “If You See Something, Say Something” campaign. The goal is to create a safe experience for all guests and staff. We recommend packing as light as possible. We encourage guests to leave bags and purses at home. Bags will be inspected prior to entry. Types of bags allowed: Small wallet sized clutch purse no larger than 6″ x 8″ Clear bag that does not exceed 12″ x 12″ x 9″ Medical, parenting, and camera bags. All bags are subject to search. Military Discounts Sarah McNew 2025-08-05T10:01:24-04:00 Military Discounts Visit the buy tickets page on www.DrinkEatRelax.com Add tickets to your cart. View your cart. Click on the GREEN LOGO “Verify With ID.me” in the upper right hand corner.. You will go to a new window to enter your military information. Once approved by IDME a discount will be applied to your cart automatically. Offer not valid on-site. What NOT to Bring Sarah McNew 2024-08-28T15:49:13-04:00 What NOT to Bring No pets. Service dogs are welcome in accordance with ADA guidance and Koka Booth Amphitheatre’s accessibility policies . No weapons. Included but not limited to knives, guns, mace. tasers, chains, studded/spiked jewelry. All bags are subject to search by our security team. No smoking or vaping inside the building. No outside alcohol or illegal substances. All bags are subject to search by our security team. Alcohol Bags & backpacks. Please see our clear bag policy . Coolers Drones Fireworks/sparklers of any kind Food Frisbees, balls, and all sporting equipment Go Pros, audio and/or video recorders Grills & open flame inside or outside the venue. Mats of any kind including yoga mats. Tables of any kind Tents/Staking Tarps, plastic, and blankets with Nylon or non-breathable material Professional cameras with detachable lenses Wagons What to Bring Sarah McNew 2025-08-05T10:00:31-04:00 What to Bring Small wallet sized clutch purse no larger than 6″ x 8″ Clear bag that does not exceed 12″ x 12″ x 9″ Koka Booth Amphitheatre is a cashless venue. There are not, and will not be, any ATMs available for patron use. The Box Office, Guest Services, and Concessions do not and will not accept cash. Some vendors onsite will accept cash, as well as other cashless forms of payment; if you want to offer cash to some vendors, please plan accordingly. Factory sealed plastic bottles of water (1 per person). No glass/cans/flavored water. Lawn chairs. Please remove the chair from the bag at the security checkpoint. No footrest or canopy. No lounge or tri-fold chairs. Rain coats & ponchos Strollers Tablets Umbrellas Empty reusable bottles. Water fill stations are available in the Cobblestone Courtyard. Valid ID – All guests participating in alcohol sampling must be 21+ years old. Everyone will have their ID checked to verify that they are of age to sample alcohol at the event. Snacks. Bring your pretzel necklace! All bags are subject to search. General Event Information Sarah McNew 2022-03-29T17:01:09-04:00 General Event Information It’s for a good cause! A portion of event proceeds go to Spirit of Hope Children’s Foundation Visit: www.spiritofhopechildrensfoundation.org Follow us on Facebook and Instagram to see fun event photos and get information in real time @BeerBourbonBBQ Must be 21 years of age or older to participate in alcohol sampling. Your tickets will be e-mailed to you, and we recommend you bring a printed copy of the PDF ticket that you received when you placed your order to ensure speedy entrance into the event. If you have trouble accessing your PDF tickets please email team@drinkeatrelax.com for assistance! As well, please have each guest in your party carry their own individual ticket, and please check in at the designated station according to the ticket you each have purchased. Lines to enter will be marked with signage. You can reconvene with your group inside the festival. Our team is here to help – please ask if you have any questions onsite. Looking to transfer your ticket? Absolutely, the name on the ticket is irrelevant, only the barcode is significant! Please forward your PDF e-ticket to the guest attending! Valid ID is required. Ask for half pours if you are unsure about a product – you can always go back for more. Come hungry! Our food vendors will be sure to have a variety of delicious food, and are ready to serve you. Water is free and available at our rinsing stations. If you want a bottle of water, they are $2 and can be found at the Merchandise tent. Our event staff is here to help you! Please visit the show office on the day of the event if you have any questions. Alcohol Sampling. This is a sampling structured event. This means that you are given a tasting glass (if you purchased a tasting ticket) that will allow you to RESPONSIBLY enjoy all of the products featured at the show. These samples are all-you-care-to-taste from this sampling glass. Intoxicated and unruly guests will be removed from the event without a refund. Re-Entry. You can come and go, just make sure you get your hand stamped at the exit! Last Call is 20 minutes till the end of the event. We stop pouring alcohol at 15 minutes prior to the end of the event. Contact Us Your Name Your Email Subject Your Message × BUY TICKETS NOW × Join Our Mailing List Close Interested in Exhibiting or Sponsoring? Please contact us at sales@drinkeatrelax.com Onsite ticket sales will be available. Onsite ticket prices will be increased to cover all taxes and fees. Contact National BBQ Week - Get in Touch for Queries & Support Skip to content Home BBQ Facts Tips/Advice/Legends Recipes Budget Barbi’s Better for you BBQ advice BarbiBlog Get in touch Home BBQ Facts Tips/Advice/Legends Recipes Budget Barbi’s Better for you BBQ advice BarbiBlog Get in touch Share your Barbi best… BBQ has now become a major summer lifestyle trend and really big business, worth in excess of £1.75+ billion pa, with over 65 million BBQ occasions being held in 2024. With a dry Spring, this summer the weather looks set to be pretty good with ‘heatwaves’ being predicted  and of course we’ve got major sporting events, plus they’ll be the usual Summer Music Festivals. So lots to enjoy. So, if you’re interested in BBQ, or want to find out how you can get involved this year or in next year’s major, biggest-ever Barbi celebration, the 30th National BBQ Week, or maybe you’d just like to tell us what you’ll be getting up to on the Barbi front. ...so get in touch & don't forget tosave money with our Barbi's-on-a-Budget hacks! Find out more, or share here 29 th National BBQ Week™ 2025- Press & BBQ info Contact: Email press info 020 3872 2573 30 Years of Better BBQ & Gastro Grilling, our biggest ever 30 th National BBQ Week™ 2026 – Sponsorship info Contact: Email sponship  info 020 3872 2573 The BBQ market is sizzling! There’s no stopping the growth of BBQ’ing with chillin’ at home being ever more popular and with the market reaching £1.75 billion+ in 2023 and projected to reach over £2.5 in 2025! (NBQA/Mintel/Kantar/Trade estimates) LEGAL NOTICE – NATIONAL BBQ WEEK – INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY TM © the National BBQ Week™ and associated events including the BBQ RoadShow, BBQ Baptas, Barbi for Britain, Barbimates, BBQ Buddy and BarbiBlog are exclusively organised & operated by Grocerama Ltd and are protected under UK Intellectual Property Law; Participation in or association with the 29th National BBQ Week is strictly only by way of invitation or agreement with the organisers; Grocerama Limited 86-90 Paul Street, Hoxton, London EC2A 4NE T: 020 3872 2573 – E: Email X-twitter Facebook Instagram National BBQ Week is part of the Grocerama’s Together Is Better multi-brand grocery promotional programme – www.grocerama.co.uk ©Copyright 2025 | Grocerama | www.nationalbbqweek.co.uk Home BBQ Facts Tips/Advice/Legends Recipes Budget Barbi’s Better for you BBQ advice BarbiBlog Get in touch Home BBQ Facts Tips/Advice/Legends Recipes Budget Barbi’s Better for you BBQ advice BarbiBlog Get in touch

Reserve About us bringing homestyle flavors Owner and founder James Woodard established Smokin Woods in 2013 at the encouragement of family and friends. Humbly beginning as a catering and pop-up kitchen, he transformed his passion for pairing good vibes and mouthwatering barbecue. Enlisting the help of his two brothers, James settled in the vibrant neighborhood of North Oakland and opened his flagship restaurant with one goal in mind – create smiles through food. About Us - Pueblo Brewpub | Shamrock Brewing Company Share Your Feedback Home Search for: Search The Brewery Craft Beer Restaurant Menus Brunch Lunch Menu Dinner Menu Kids Menu Late Night Menu Specials & Events Weekly Specials Upcoming Events Event Facilities Brew News What’s On Tap Pub Gossip Events The Luck of The Irish About Us Shamrock Merchandise Employment History Hours & Location Contact Us Search for: Search Shamrock Brewing Company > About Us About Us Pueblo Brewpub & Restaurant About Us – Shamrock Brewing Company Located just two blocks from the Courtyard Marriott Hotel and the Convention Center in the heart of historic Pueblo, Colorado, Shamrock Brewing Company is the only Pueblo restaurant to offer a distinct dining alternative. Consisting of equal parts Irish pub, craft brewery, and restaurant makes Shamrock Brewing Company a truly unique Pueblo restaurant experience. We believe great beer , excellent food , and good friends go hand in hand. The food is great, the beer is world class, and the craic is outstanding! Craic (pronounced crack) is a Gaelic word, meaning a fun, friendly and exuberant atmosphere. Whether for business or pleasure, Shamrock Brewing Company in Pueblo, Colorado is the place to meet. Our antique mahogany bar is warm and inviting. We offer an extensive list of top-shelf Irish and Scotch whiskeys, an ample wine selection, and specialty cocktails; but our passion is craft beer. Not to sound too selfish, but we brew what we want to drink. Our base two-row base malt is the freshest around, malted right here in Colorado.  We also use the choicest hops from the Pacific Northwest and yeast strains carefully chosen by our brewer.  We never use additives, preservatives or pasteurization in our brewing process. We are equally passionate about our food and, of course, we cook with our beer – something that good cannot be reserved entirely for drinking! Chef and GM Gordon Cossar (a.k.a. Chef Gordo) only uses the freshest ingredients and everything is house made – including our salad dressings and desserts.  Our chef-inspired Irish specialties and American brewpub fare offer something for the entire family. Shamrock Brewing Company serves as a meeting place for everything from business lunches to family dinners, and everything in between. Stop by for our Pueblo restaurant and brewery for weekend brunch, lunch, happy hour (temporarily unavailable), dinner or the late night menu. Our passion is craft beer and great food, but we also love sports and show all the games on our many HD TVs. Meet your friends or make new ones, bring your family or host an event – just make sure you come thirsty and hungry. Slainte! Football Fans – The Shamrock is the best place to watch all the games in Pueblo with NFL Sunday Ticket and all the NCAA games. Stop by for Saturday and Sunday Brunch and catch all the action! How Can We Help? Let us help you plan your next party or event! Learn More Call us at About Us History Employment Shamrock Merchandise Get Connected Receive our eNewsletter. Name * Email * Name This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged. Contact Us Quick Links The Brewery Hours & Location Brew News History Contact Us © 2025 Shamrock Brewing Company. Web Design and Development by Webolutions
